title: Online Dictionary of Zilo Andi
text:
The dictionary was compiled in 2022â€“2024 by G. Moroz (Linguistic Convergence Laboratory, HSE University). The online version was prepared by G. Moroz. You can always contact me via email or leave an issue on the GitHub page. Please note that I use capital latin I instead of the palochka sign.
Please refer to the dictionary as follows:

Plain textBibTeX


Moroz, G. (2024). Online Dictionary of Zilo Andi (v1.0.0). Moscow. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.7803955. https://agricolamz.github.io/zilo_dictionary.
